# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Create a buffer from any sequence of elements.

## Declaration

```swift
init<S>(_ sequence: S) where S : Sequence, S.Element == Int16
```

## Creating a mesh buffer

- **init(_:)**: Create a buffer from any sequence of elements.
- **init(_:)**: Create buffer from an array of elements.
